metadata.name: Possible Impacket SecretDump Remote Activity - Zeek
metadata.comment: Detect AD credential dumping using impacket secretdump HKTL. Based on the SIGMA rules/windows/builtin/win_impacket_secretdump.yml

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\')) AND contains(lower(file.path), lower('admin$')) AND contains(lower(file.name), lower('system32\\')) AND endswith(lower(file.name), lower('.tmp')))

output.summary: Detect AD credential dumping using impacket secretdump HKTL. Based on the SIGMA rules/windows/builtin/win_impacket_secretdump.yml
